name: formance-numscript-generator
description: Numscrip generator for Formance open source ledger

scripts.release:patch: HUSKY=0 npm version patch -m 'chore: release version %s' && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: HUSKY=0 npm version minor -m 'chore: release version %s' && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: HUSKY=0 npm version major -m 'chore: release version %s' && git push --follow-tags

author: NathanFirmo
